definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: depth, deep;—abs. [[מְחוּלָה]] Job 41:23 +; pl. abs. [[מְחוֹלׂת]] Ex 15:5, Ne 9:11, [[מְחׂלוֹת]] Ps 88:7; cstr. [[מְחוּלוֹת]] Zec 10:11, [[מְחֻלוֹת]] Mic 7:19, Ps 68:23; —depth, pl. [[יׇם]] ´[[מ]] depths of the sea Mic 7:19, Ps 68:23; abs. Ex 15:5 (of Red Sea) Ne 9:11 (id.); fig. of deep distress Ps 88:7 (‖[[בּוֹר תַּחְתִיּוֹת]]); [[יְאׂר]] ´[[מ]] Zec 10:11 (i.e. of Nile); sg. = the deep sea, deep, Ps 107:24, Jon 2:4, Job 41:23 (in hyperb. descript. of crocodile); depth of marsh, swamp, ´[[בִּיוֵן מ]] Ps 69:3 in mire of (the) depth, fig. of distress (‖[[מַעֲמַקֵּי־מַיִם]]), cf. ´[[מ]] alone v:Ps 69:16 (‖[[בְּאֵר]]).
